episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 770: Post Larsen Spawn, Civil War II 1-4, and Marvel Omnibuses
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward kicks off the weekend show by thanking the donors to the show, then talks about Spawn after Erik Larsen left the book, gives his impressions of the first four issues of Civil War II, then answers the question “If Marvel is dumping their omnibuses so often, is it a successful format?”

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 769: Top Five Cold Based Characters
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about the start of the Patreon campaign and gives his top five favorite cold based characters.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 768: Update on Patreon
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward gives a quick update on the status of the Patreon campaign, as well as his thoughts on the recent Academy Award win by the Suicide Squad movie.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 767: Delusional Heroism
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward wonders about heroism.

episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about all of the current comic book related TV shows he watches.

episodes.title: Not Comic Book Noise: The Fate of the Deliberate Noise Network Part 1
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about the future of the Deliberate Noise Network. This is not a test, hyperbole, or an imaginary story.

episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward sort of  talks about fat characters.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 763: Library Books, Books Still Wrapped In Plastic, and Adding To The To-Read Pile
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about the solution to the problem with DC lacking a digital service, some books he used to read, some books he hasn't read, and some books he plans to read.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 762: The Return of the Long Winded Rambling
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about The Legion of Super-Heroes, X-Men, Hulk, Namor, The Liberty Legion, Teen Titans, and Archie. He's not as cohesive as it may sound.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 761: Quick Update on Scribd and Comics

episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about the demise of the Scribd comic book section, Amazon Prime's comic book section, Archie by Mark Waid, and Civil War 2 #3.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 758: Cars, Captain America, and Future Reading
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about hopefully getting a new car soon, the Captain America titles, and he tries to figure out what he wants to read next.

episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about the third part of the DC/CW crossover "Heroes vs Aliens". This is the episode of Arrow, which has a very familiar plot (and that's not a bad thing).

episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about Chelsea Cain, the recent Mockingbird series of books, and gives an update on his car situation.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 751: New Season of Comic Book TV Shows and Superman
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about the new season of comic book TV shows, gives quick thoughts on The Strain, Lucifer, Marvel's Agents of SHIELD, and Supergirl, then pivots to talk about the various incarnations of Superman,and gives his opinion on guys from Kansas.

episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward says goodbye to the Marvel's Avengers Alliance game, gets caught up on Scooby Apocalypse, and gets bummed out when his car cuts off.

episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about the second issue of Wacky Raceland, how he has come around to seeing the city of Gotham as a character in its own right, and why he probably won't be reading the Lucifer comic book series.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 728: More Suicide Squad Thoughts
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: On the eleventh anniversary of the Deliberate Noise Network, host Derek Coward talks more about his thoughts on the movie Suicide Squad, real locations for fictional towns, how far back you have to go to get another DC movie he liked as much, and why "Not my Superman" doesn't make sense to him.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 727: Suicide Squad Parking Lot Review
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about the 2016 film 'Suicide Squad' while sitting in the parking lot of the theater.

episodes.summary: If host Derek Coward had hosted Marvel Noise Episode 276, this is how his sections would have sounded.

episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about Milestone Comics at the request of Carlos Cordova.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 725: Suicide Squad Reviews and The Official Answer To Every Question
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about the savage reviews of Suicide Squad, why he doesn't take movie reviews seriously at all, and gives the Official Comic Book Noise answer to any and all questions.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 724: Tyler Hoechlin, Krypton, Gotham, and Near Collisions
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward gives his thoughts on the one image he has seen of Tyler Hoechlin as Superman, wonders what happened to Krypton, talks about Gotham and how it should have possibly have been Gotham Central, and ends this short show in a good mood for a bad reason.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 723: Geoff Johns For President
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about the recent promotion for Geoff Johns and what he hopes it means for DC.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 722: Explanation
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about the last episode of Comic Book Noise and how it almost didn't get posted, World War 2 stories, Pearl Harbor, and Mark Waid.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 721: Indecision
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about the indecision he feels about this year's Dog Days of Podcasting challenge, his disappointment with the Big Two, people who don't answer the question asked, and the Fantastic Four.

episodes.title: ComicBookNoise720: Guardians Of The Galaxy 2
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about the concept art for Guardians Of The Galaxy 2, Mantis, and epic storylines from the past.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 719: Going Over My Pull List
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks about his pull list.

episodes.title: Comic Book Noise 718: Loans, Larsen, Paste, and Spider-Man
episodes.author: derek@comicbooknoise.com (Derek Coward)
episodes.summary: Host Derek Coward talks a piece of email that made him laugh, why Erik Larsen is skipping San Diego, butchers an article on exclusive contracts, gives his opinion on someone else's argument against reality, and talks briefly about the next year of Spider-Man stories.
